issue.title: [Doc] General outline
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14605](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14605). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Make a general outline of the New Contributors Guide where other parts (sub-tasks) will be inserted to.

Brainstorming content index
 \* Intro
 \* Steps in making your first PR
 \* Tutorials
 \* Other info/resources
